Replace.Text: Emperor Keke <Scarlet Nightmare>
"Scarlet Nightmare" Tokisaki Kurumi
Emperor Keke <Scarlet Nightmare>
Kekedi: The Bullet of One
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the military unit currently located in the city's territory has +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.
+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement.
Emperor Keke: The Second Bullet
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project, it takes [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the enemy military units currently located in this city's territory have -1 [ICON_Movement] movement power.
Kekedi: The Bullet of Three
Tokisaki Kurumi's special item, it takes [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the military units currently in this city's territory get additional combat experience points.
+33% experience gained from battles.
Emperor Keke: The Fourth Bullet
Tokisaki Kurumi's special item, it takes [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the military units currently in the city's territory can be healed every round.
This unit heals every turn.
Emperor Keke: The Bullet of Five
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project, it takes [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the military units currently located in this city's territory have +1 vision.
Vision +1.
Emperor Keke: The Bullet of Six
Tokisaki Kurumi's characteristic item, it takes [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the enemy military units currently located in this city's territory have -1 vision.
Field of view -1.
Emperor Keke: The Seventh Bullet

Tokisaki Kurumi's special project requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the movement of other players' current military unit [ICON_Movement] will drop significantly, lasting for three rounds.
[ICON_Movement] Movement has dropped significantly.
Kekedi: The Bullet of Eight
Tokisaki Kurumi's special item requires [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time to obtain a Nightmare Shadow that does not consume [ICON_Citizen] population.
Emperor Keke: The Bullet of Nine
Tokisaki Kurumi's special project, it takes [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time to obtain temporary vision of all cities and city-states.
Emperor Keke: The Bullet of Ten

Tokisaki Kurumi's special project, it takes [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time to increase the visibility level of [ICON_VisLimited] objects with the lowest diplomatic visibility by one level. [COLOR_Civ6Red] Refund [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time spent[ENDCOLOR] if diplomatic visibility to all civilizations is at max.
Emperor Keke: The Eleventh Bullet

Tokisaki Kurumi's three characteristic items need [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and your empire will get [ICON_Science] science value, [ICON_Culture] culture value, [ICON_Gold] gold coin and [ICON_Faith] faith proportional to the city's productivity.
Emperor Keke: Twelve Bullets

Tokisaki Kurumi's three special items need [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and other empires lose the [ICON_Science] science value, [ICON_Culture] culture value, [ICON_Gold] gold coin and [ICON_Faith] belief produced in three rounds.
+{1_num} points of [ICON_Production] production.
+{1_num} [ICON_Gold] gold coins.
shadow force
Gain additional [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength from Nightmare Camp and adjacent Nightmare Shadows.
+{Amount} from Nightmare Camp
+{Amount} from adjacent Nightmare Shadows
one shot
+1 [ICON_Movement] Movement. Ignores [ICON_Movement] movement cost of terrain and landforms.
Second bullet
Adjacent enemy units -1[ICON_Movement] movement. Only adjacent enemy units can spot this unit.
space shock
100% effective when attacking cities and camps from a distance. When killing a unit in combat, all adjacent enemy combat units lose [ICON_Damaged] health.
Eclipse
Gain extra [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time when destroying 1 unit. When attacking a city, there is a chance that it will lose population and gain [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time.
Double the pain
When attacking wounded units, +5 [ICON_Strength] combat strength. When destroying 1 unit, up to 30 HP can be healed.
The realm of circulation
Block the first non-lethal damage taken each round.
dance of time
If [ICON_Movement] mobility allows, +1 extra attack per round. Chance to restore [ICON_Movement] movement and attack count when killing a unit in combat.
Eclipse City

Tokisaki Kurumi's three special items consume one [ICON_Citizen] population in exchange for [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time, and the loyalty of the city [ICON_Loyalty] decreases slightly. [NEWLINE][COLOR_RED] If the city has only one [ICON_Citizen] population left, it will become a free city. [ENDCOLOR]
Get {1_iAmount} points [ICON_Resource_Kurumi_Time] time
-1 [ICON_Movement] Movement (Nightmare Wall).
I am an elf.
Come on, come on, let's get started. (invites you to visit)
You are a prey a thousand times more delicious than cake. (accept your invitation)
Come on, come on, let's get started. (exchange the location of the capital)
Time is extremely considerate, and time is extremely cruel.
If it's you, it's ok (Declaration of friendship was published.)
I'm scary right? (Declaration of friendship rejected.)
Hey, behind the arrogant smile, I also feel very lonely. (Tokisaki Kurumi seeks a declaration of friendship with you.)

The Weaver Girl and the Cowherd will never forget each other no matter how many years it rains. Hey... no matter how many years it rains, will you never forget me? (Published a declaration of friendship with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
...Ah, oh, oh (I rejected the declaration of friendship with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Then, I will kill you virtuously as you wish. (An open declaration of war against Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Hee hee hee hee hee hee, this way they will definitely die together. (It was publicly declared war by Tokisaki Kurumi.)
It's time to stop. (Tokisaki Kurumi was defeated.)
Just end it here. (Tokisaki Kurumi was defeated.)
It looks delicious, so looking forward to it~ (I have accepted the visit of the special envoy.)
……Oh My God. (The special envoy's visit has been rejected.)
Ah, ah, I am very interested in what you are doing, don't put on such a pose, let me join in too. (Tokisaki Kurumi asked the special envoy to visit.)
Ahhh, it's really unbearable. (Accepted as a special envoy to visit.)
Ah lah. (Refused to visit the special envoy.)
Time cannot run the chains of life and destiny! (A statement of reproach was issued to Tokisaki Kurumi.)

You obviously want to kill a certain creature, but you don't have the awareness to be killed. Don't you think this kind of mentality is strange? (A statement of reproach was issued by Tokisaki Kurumi.)
——Then, this time, let me truly repay the favor I owe you. (The establishment of an embassy is accepted.)
I am also a wayward child. (The establishment of the embassy was rejected.)
Ah, ah, I am very interested in what you are doing, don't put on such a pose, let me join in too. (Tokisaki Kurumi wanted to set up an embassy.)
──Welcome, I have been waiting for you for a long time. (Embassies are permitted.)
How sad. (Refused to open an embassy.)
Changes in people's hearts can't even be predicted by themselves.
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Cultural Value Emphasis" (high cultural value)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Happiness is important" (high satisfaction)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "likes gold coins" (a lot of gold coins are earned)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "heavy industrialist" (high production value)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "city-state alliance" (does not conflict with city-state suzerainty)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "numberism" (large population)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Tech Follower" (high tech value)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Standing Army" (high military strength)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Survival of the fittest believers" (active in war)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Advocate for Great Men" (great men are rare)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Heritage Cherisher" (with few spectacle)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "City-State Protector" (actively protecting the city-state)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "City-State Protector" (actively protecting the city-state)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Air Force" (air force is high)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "City-State Protector" (actively protecting the city-state)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Civilization" (repel barbarian camps)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "environmentalist" (dedicated to nature conservation and national park development)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Developmentist" (passionate about logging and terrain improvement)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "idealistic physique" (same as the government)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Nuclear Joy" (active use of nuclear weapons)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Piety" (high Faith)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Explorer" (very low map completion)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "paranoia" (lack of military power and drive to expand territories)
——You, you can’t even go down to the lower realms.
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Cultural Value Emphasis" (Cultural value is very low)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Happiness Emphasis" (very low satisfaction)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "like gold coins" (the gold coin income is very small)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "city-state alliance" (conflict with city-state suzerainty)
Goes against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "heavy industrialist" (low production value)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "numberism" (small population)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Tech Follower" (very low tech)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Standing Army" (military strength is very low)
Goes against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Paranoia" (full of military might and drive to expand territory)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "the spokesperson of the great man" (there are many great men)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Heritage Cherisher" (many spectacle)
Goes against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "City-State Protector" (no protection of the city-state)
Goes against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "City-State Protector" (no protection of the city-state)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Air Force" (air force is very low)
Goes against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "City-State Protector" (no protection of the city-state)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Civilization" (leave the barbarian camps alone)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "environmentalist" (destruction of nature)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Developmentist" (passionate about nature conservation)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "idealistic constitution" (government is different)
Going against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "nuclear pleasure" (unwillingness to use nuclear weapons)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Piety" (low Faith)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Explorer" (high map completion)
Let me have a good taste of you~ (I have agreed to form an alliance.)
Heck, don't you believe me? It's so sad, I want to cry. (Refused to form an alliance.)
Come fall in love with me~ (Alliance negotiation begins)
Let me have a good taste of you~ (Agreed to form an alliance.)
To me everyone is both pathetic and lovely food. (Refused to form an alliance.)
Ahhahahaha~ (Agreed to the transaction.)
Come on... more gas please. (Refused to trade.)
Very gentle, isn't it? (The transaction is established.)
Right now I have a proposal, let's change the rules, it's not a difficult thing, just change the target~ (The transaction was rejected.)
Time is extremely considerate, and time is extremely cruel. (Tokisaki Kurumi is satisfied with the terms and conditions.)
Hehehe, it's really dangerous. (Tokisaki Kurumi declined the request.)
I dedicate everything to you except spiritual power and life. (Tokisaki Kurumi accepted the request.)
Hehehe, I have to ask you to really take responsibility. (Accepted Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
Either give me an eyeball, or let me drink your blood, or touch my head to comfort me, or I will continue to cry. (Refused Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
It's almost time to add 'time'... (Conclude peace negotiations with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Hee hee hee... You───Don't you understand? ? You are absolutely ─ ─ ─ ─ there is no way to completely destroy me! ! (The peaceful negotiation was rejected by Tokisaki Kurumi.)
How should I put it, should I say it is an inexhaustible fate, or an inseparable relationship... (Tokisaki Kurumi proposes peaceful negotiations.)
It's almost time to add 'time'... (Conclude peace negotiations with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Hee hee hee... You───Don't you understand? ? You are absolutely ─ ─ ─ ─ there is no way to completely destroy me! ! (Rejected Tokisaki Kurumi's peace negotiations.)
Come on, come on, please come in. (Tokisaki Kurumi permits the border to open.)
Hehehe, it's really dangerous. (Tokisaki Kurumi refused to open the border.)
Ah, ah, I am very interested in what you are doing, don't put on such a pose, let me join in too. (Tokisaki Kurumi called for the border to be opened.)
Ahhhhhhhh, can't wait, can't wait. (Tokisaki Kurumi was allowed to open the border.)
I'm scary right? (Tokisaki Kurumi was refused to open the border.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi made a promise to you to stop settling near the border.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored warnings and continued to settle near the border.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi made a promise to you not to take military action.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored warnings and sought opportunities for military action.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promised you not to send spies.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored warnings and continued his espionage.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promises not to steal secret treasures.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and continued to steal secret treasures.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promised you to stop missionary work.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and continued his missionary activities.)
Tokisaki Kurumi asks you: stop colonizing near the border
Ah la, play with me first. (Agreed to Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
No one can escape the cage of time. (Reject Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
Tokisaki Kurumi asks you: Do not send troops near the border
Ah la, play with me first. (Agreed to Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
No one can escape the cage of time. (Reject Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
Tokisaki Kurumi asks you: stop sending spies
Ah la, play with me first. (Agreed to Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
No one can escape the cage of time. (Reject Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
Tokisaki Kurumi asks you: Do not steal secret treasures
Ah la, play with me first. (Agreed to Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
No one can escape the cage of time. (Reject Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
Tokisaki Kurumi asks you: stop missionary activities
Ah la, play with me first. (Agreed to Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
No one can escape the cage of time. (Reject Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)

If... just if oh, year, year, year after year... the rain keeps falling on July 7th, and the Milky Way that separates them is always choppy...then the two of them, will they still miss each other? ? (Tokisaki Kurumi wants to continue the alliance.)
Ahhhhhhhh, can't wait, can't wait. (Tokisaki Kurumi's alliance is permitted to continue.)
Hope to meet again one day. (Reject Tokisaki Kurumi's alliance continuation.)
I am here to become one with you~ (The continuation of the alliance has been permitted.)
I am also a wayward child. (Continuation of the alliance has been denied.)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "gossip" (active declaration of friendship, open borders, dispatch of envoys, establishment of embassies)
"Gossip" against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda (passive declaration of friendship, open borders, dispatch of envoys, establishment of embassies)
In line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Follow" (Golden Age Usher)
Going against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Follow" (Plunge into Dark Ages)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's Agenda "Human Lovers" (Plunge into Dark Ages)
Going against Tokisaki Kurumi's Agenda "Human Lovers" (Golden Age Ushers in)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Territorial Expansionist" (large territory)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "territorial expansionist" (territorial smallness)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Flat Earthist" (Passive participation in space development competition)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Flat Earthist" (actively participates in space development competition)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Great・Snow White・Fleet" (Navy is strong)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Great・Snow White・Fleet" (Navy is weak)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "instigator" (low diplomacy support)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "instigator" (high diplomatic support)
It is in line with Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda of "building a country by tourism" (tourism power is very low)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda of "building a country by tourism" (high tourism power)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Religious Intolerance" (same religion)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "religious intolerance" (different religions)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Liberal" (few diplomatic victory points)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Liberal" (lots of diplomatic victory points)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Plunderer" (lots of looted cells)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Plunderer" (few cells looted)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Anakuma Siege" (hasn't conquered another civ's capital)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Kakuma Siege" (conquered the capital of another civilization)
Conforms to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "The Zealous Party" (religion created by Faith Values)
Contrary to Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "zealous party" (do not believe in the religion founded by the value)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Scrooge" (a lot of money earned in gold coins)
Go against Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Scrooge" (little gold coin income)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Advocate for Great Men" (great men are rare)
Fits Tokisaki Kurumi's agenda "Heritage Cherisher" (with few spectacle)

Let me have a good taste of you~ (I have agreed to form an alliance.)
Heck, don't you believe me? It's so sad, I want to cry. (Refused to form an alliance.)
Come fall in love with me~ (Alliance negotiation begins)
Let me have a good taste of you~ (Agreed to form an alliance.)
To me everyone is both pathetic and lovely food. (Refused to form an alliance.)
Ahhahahaha~ (Agreed to the transaction.)
Come on... more gas please. (Refused to trade.)
Very gentle, isn't it? (The transaction is established.)
Right now I have a proposal, let's change the rules, it's not a difficult thing, just change the target~ (The transaction was rejected.)
Time is extremely considerate, and time is extremely cruel. (Tokisaki Kurumi is satisfied with the terms and conditions.)
Hehehe, it's really dangerous. (Tokisaki Kurumi declined the request.)
I dedicate everything to you except spiritual power and life. (Tokisaki Kurumi accepted the request.)
Hehehe, I have to ask you to really take responsibility. (Accepted Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
Either give me an eyeball, or let me drink your blood, or touch my head to comfort me, or I will continue to cry. (Refused Tokisaki Kurumi's request.)
It's almost time to add 'time'... (Conclude peace negotiations with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Hee hee hee... You───Don't you understand? ? You are absolutely ─ ─ ─ ─ there is no way to completely destroy me! ! (The peaceful negotiation was rejected by Tokisaki Kurumi.)
How should I put it, should I say it is an inexhaustible fate, or an inseparable relationship... (Tokisaki Kurumi proposes peaceful negotiations.)
It's almost time to add 'time'... (Conclude peace negotiations with Tokisaki Kurumi.)
Hee hee hee... You───Don't you understand? ? You are absolutely ─ ─ ─ ─ there is no way to completely destroy me! ! (Rejected Tokisaki Kurumi's peace negotiations.)
Come on, come on, please come in. (Tokisaki Kurumi permits the border to open.)
Hehehe, it's really dangerous. (Tokisaki Kurumi refused to open the border.)
Ah, ah, I am very interested in what you are doing, don't put on such a pose, let me join in too. (Tokisaki Kurumi called for the border to be opened.)
Ahhhhhhhh, can't wait, can't wait. (Tokisaki Kurumi was allowed to open the border.)
I'm scary right? (Tokisaki Kurumi was refused to open the border.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi made a promise to you to stop settling near the border.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored warnings and continued to settle near the border.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi made a promise to you not to take military action.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored warnings and sought opportunities for military action.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promised you not to send spies.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored warnings and continued his espionage.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promises not to steal secret treasures.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and continued to steal secret treasures.)
The scary, scary Fire Spirit is here again today, so let me say goodbye here. (Tokisaki Kurumi promised you to stop missionary work.)
In the eyes of the poor and lovely me, you are all bait. (Tokisaki Kurumi ignored the warning and continued his missionary activities.)
